name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 居妙複製精靈 Gmail Genie by Hongyinull

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
居妙精靈，郵件處理不費心🧚
Gmail Genie, emails handled cleanly✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
叮鈴鈴！居妙精靈是一款專為Gmail設計的插件，讓郵件處理變得前所未有的輕鬆簡單！從此告別繁瑣的複製貼上，準備好迎接郵件管理的魔法ㄅ！

📧一鍵複製信件主旨，讓你輕鬆管理郵件內容，省時省力！
💌一鍵複製發件人email位址 ，不要手用複製發件人地址！也不用點開頭像複製！輕輕按一下就複製好啦！
🚀複製無死角，收件匣也可以複製標題！再也不需要點進去點進去再複製囉
📬一鍵設置，無縫融合～完美嵌入Gmail界面，安裝後無需額外設定！

不再為繁瑣的郵件處理浪費時間，居妙精靈助你提升效率，專注於更重要的事情！
快來下載居妙精靈，體驗郵件處理的全新魔法世界吧！🌟
Gmail Genie by Hongyinull, emails handled cleanly and magically!

Eh-Eh-Oh! Say hello to Gmail Genie – the magical Gmail extension that makes handling emails a breeze! Wave goodbye to copy-paste hassles and get ready for some email magic!

📧 One-Click Wonder: Instantly copy your Gmail email subject.
💌 One-Click Magic: Copy Sender's Email. No more manual copying or clicking on avatars!
🚀 Copy Everywhere, Even the Inbox!Gmail Genie boosts your efficiency so you can focus on the fun stuff!
📬 Seamless Setup: Perfect Integration. No extra settings needed, just pure magic, anywhere, anytime!

Download Gmail Genie now and experience the magical world of email handling! 🌟
Gmail Genie by Hongyinull, emails handled cleanly and magically!
